meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that can infect the stomach lining.
meanings.sent1: The pylori in his stomach caused him discomfort.
meanings.sent2: Doctors found pylori in her stomach during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The pylori bacteria in his stomach were having a party!
meanings.sent4: The pylori multiplied in his stomach like an unstoppable army.
meanings.sent5: The pylori bacteria in his stomach were like unwelcome guests overstaying their welcome.

meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by the bacterium Helicobacter pylori.
meanings.sent1: She was diagnosed with pylori-related stomach issues.
meanings.sent2: The pylori infection was causing him discomfort.
meanings.sent3: His pylori-related symptoms made him the star of the party!
meanings.sent4: The pylori-related problems were a dark cloud over his health.
meanings.sent5: The pylori-related issues were like a stubborn stain that wouldn't go away.
